result.arabic_text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ
result.translation: Nasi hatukumjaalia mwanaadamu yeyote kabla yako kuwa na maisha ya milele. Basi je! Ukifa wewe, wao wataishi milele?
result.footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Hatukumjaalia mwanaadamu yeyote kabla yako wewe aishi milele, hata ikawa hao makafiri wakawa wanakutamania ufe wewe. Vipi wanakutamania mauti wewe na hali na wao vile vile watakufa kama wewe? Ukifa wewe, je, ndio wao watabakia kushinda wanaadamu wote?
